texts.name: Sargas
texts.biography: Sargas for a long time studied the basics of navigation and intelligence and has quite succeeded in this. Skilfully using his knowledge, he successfully controlled a large number of pirate enclaves. Knowing this, Commander-in-Chief Raven invited him to join his mission, making responsible for the sea movement of his troops.

specialty.name: Navigation
specialty.description: Receives a 5% per level bonus to movement points at sea.
